accounts.name: last_duel
docs: Optional last duel account for verification when PDAs don't match.
Pass this account if the token has a pending duel that doesn't match the expected duel PDA.
If bonding curve has a last_duel and this account is not passed, the transaction will fail.

accounts.name: creator
docs: Creator of the bonding curve (must match bonding_curve.creator). Receives the SOL.

accounts.name: token_program
docs: Token-2022 program (required for mint interface validation).

accounts.name: authority
docs: Signer: either the beneficiary (self-claim) or config.delegated_claim_authority (delegated claim).

accounts.name: beneficiary
docs: Beneficiary: wallet whose loser balance is used and who receives winner tokens. Must equal authority (self-claim) or authority must be config.delegated_claim_authority.

accounts.name: associated_bonding_curve_loser
docs: Bonding curve's ATA for loser mint (no longer receives loser tokens on claim; loser tokens stay with user).

accounts.name: user_loser_ata
docs: Beneficiary's loser token ATA (balance used for share calculation; we do not transfer these).

accounts.name: user_token_account
docs: Where to send winner tokens (beneficiary's ATA for winner_mint).

accounts.name: mint
docs: Mint account (signer, created by client)
We can't use extension constraints here because Anchor checks them before the account exists

accounts.name: bonding_curve
docs: Bonding curve PDA

accounts.name: token_2022_program
docs: Token-2022 program (used for both ATA creation and CPI calls)
Token-2022 program ID: TokenzQdBNbLqP5VEhdkAS6EPFLC1PHnBqCXEpPxuEb

accounts.name: authority
docs: Must match config.delegated_resolve_authority. Receives quote SOL for off-chain pool creation.

accounts.name: associated_bonding_curve
docs: Curve's token ATA; its full balance becomes base_amount_in for pool creation.

accounts.name: associated_authority_base
docs: Authority's base ATA; receives base tokens from curve ATA.

accounts.name: last_duel
docs: Pass this account if the token has a pending duel that doesn't match the expected duel PDA.
If bonding curve has a last_duel and this account is not passed, the transaction will fail.

errors.name: MissingAccount
errors.msg: Account expected in remaining accounts is missing

errors.name: TokenAlreadyInDuel
errors.msg: Token is already in an active duel

errors.name: MarketCapTooLow
errors.msg: Market cap too low for duels

errors.name: MarketCapTooHigh
errors.msg: Market cap too high for duels

errors.name: LastDuelAccountRequired
errors.msg: Last duel account required for verification - please include bonding curve's last_duel account

errors.name: UnauthorizedClaimer
errors.msg: Unauthorized claimer: must be position owner or delegated worker with auto-claim enabled

errors.name: InsufficientSolForGraduationFee
errors.msg: Insufficient SOL on bonding curve for graduation fee

errors.name: InsufficientCurveLamportsForPool
errors.msg: Insufficient lamports on bonding curve for pool transfer (curve must retain rent-exempt minimum)

errors.name: CreatorVaultEmpty
errors.msg: Creator vault has no SOL to claim

errors.name: InvalidCreatorVault
errors.msg: Invalid creator vault (must be program-owned PDA)

fields.name: target_mcap_growth_bps
docs: Target mcap growth in bps (e.g. 11000 = 110%). Used when matching duels.

fields.name: mcap_bucket_gap_bps
docs: Max allowed gap between mcap buckets in bps (e.g. 11000 = 10% gap per bucket). Used for mcap_to_bucket formula.

fields.name: graduate_tokens
docs: When true, allow migrate when real_token_reserves == 0 (off-chain service creates PumpSwap pool).

fields.name: graduation_fee_lamports
docs: Graduation fee in lamports sent to protocol_fee_vault (e.g. 6 SOL = 6_000_000_000).

fields.name: delegated_claim_authority
docs: Apyx system wallet; used for delegated auto-claim and validated in claim_mercy.

fields.name: delegated_resolve_authority
docs: Authority that may call resolve_duel and migrate (post-trade logic service).

fields.name: mercy_discount_multiplier_bps
docs: Mercy discount: multiplier in bps (e.g. 10000 = 1.0, 11000 = 1.1). Winner tokens sent to mercy vault = base_tokens * mercy_discount_multiplier_bps / 10000, capped by real_token_reserves.

fields.name: loser_token_circulating_snapshot
docs: Loser token circulating supply at resolution (supply - curve ATA balance); set in resolve_duel for token-based claim_mercy.

fields.name: token_a_mcap_at_start
docs: Token A market cap (lamports) at duel creation; used for progress 0% baseline.

fields.name: token_b_mcap_at_start
docs: Token B market cap (lamports) at duel join; used for progress 0% baseline.

fields.name: token_a_mcap_at_end
docs: Token A market cap (lamports) at duel resolution; set in resolve_duel.

fields.name: token_b_mcap_at_end
docs: Token B market cap (lamports) at duel resolution; set in resolve_duel.

fields.name: pool
docs: PumpSwap pool (default during migrate; pool is created off-chain in the next instruction).

types.name: UserSettings
docs: Per-wallet user settings (PDA seeds: [b"user", wallet]).
